name: Starcruiser
description:
Made in about 5 hours for the Gdevelop Jam

Aim of the Game

Your ship needs some repairs. You need to flick the switch on each level to proceed.

Controls

AS to move | Spacebar to jump | E to exit | R to restart

Special Thanks To

Gdevelop - for their amazing game engine

Link: https://gdevelop.io/

Pixel Adventure - for Pixel Frog's amazing asset pack

Link: https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1

Credits

Programming - olifire

Some Art - olifire

SFX - olifire

Feedback 

If you have any feedback make sure to leave it in the comments below.

And make sure to leave your score there too. <3

Thanks for Playing,

Oliver(olifire)
